name: Oubou Ookami to Shoushin Akazukin
nutshell:
Hana has a huge complex about her red hair. Boys always criticize it until one day.
(Source: MU)

name: Touhou Sangetsusei ~ Visionary Fairies in Shrine.
nutshell:
The fourth and final part in the official long-running Touhou Sangetsusei series, marking the long-awaited return of the daily tomfoolery by Gensokyo's Three Fairies of Light. This time, they're joined by fan-favorite and honorary fourth member, Clownpiece!
2005: Touhou Sangetsusei ~ Eastern and Little Nature Deity.
2006: Touhou Sangetsusei ~ Strange and Bright Nature Deity.
2009: Touhou Sangetsusei ~ Oriental Sacred Place.
2016: Touhou Sangetsusei ~ Visionary Fairies in Shrine.

name: Re-Kan!
nutshell: High school girl Hibiki Amami has a sixth sense of perceiving and interacting with ghosts and supernatural beings as well as talking with cats and other animals. The story follows their everyday antics. A 4-koma comedy

name: Orenchi no Maid-san
nutshell:
One day when I got home as usual, what I saw was my classmate Sara in a maid costume. It seems like she's working at my house as a live-in maid…?!
Links:

Original Web Comic (Raw) (Niconico)

name: Embrace My Dragoness
nutshell: The sudden appearance of the raccoon man, the strange death of grandma and the mysterious fortune telling house… All of these show that something unexpectedly has happened in this town. Why did grandma passed the fortune telling house to Silver Baen? Is the girl with the horn on her head trustable? The gear named Fate is starting running. How many secrets are still behind this house…

name: Seishun Lover's Festival
nutshell:
A guy who appears to be very laid-back, but is actually an amoral, idiotic, pervert! The president and vice-president team up to unmask the secret of the biggest event in a student's life! All sorts of embarrassing things can happen during the preparations for the Culture Festival!
(Source: Otakumole)

name: I’ll Make You Come With Three Fingers~ Endless Caressing on the First Night
nutshell: "You say you're a virgin, but look how wet you're getting..." Melting down there, she feels his fingers make their way inside... Nooo! I can't... I'm coming...!! Chouko is a girl who was brought up sheltered, listening to everything her parents told her to do. After ruining her own wedding ceremony, she finds out that her parents disowned and she's in debt...!? The one who saves Chouko from this predicament is Kuratani, her wedding planner. He teachers her about work and pleasure. "I'll make you into a woman, since you know nothing about the world." He comes on to her at his house, at the workplace... making her body more and more indecent...!!

name: Dull and Sweet
nutshell: Naoto Sewa works at a marketing company during the day and at a gay bar at night. During a gay matching party at the bar, Nibu Kazuma, who's straight, mistakes it for a marriage matching party...  Sewa saves Nibu from some unwanted attention and sends the man on his way. However, unexpectantly the next day, they meet again at the marketing company where they turn out to be colleagues. While spending time together as colleagues, Sewa can't help but be attracted to Nibu's kindness and sincerity. But Sewa swore that he would never fall in love with a straight man again!

name: Urban Tales
nutshell: Maximillian von Bismarck is a german highschooler, that enjoys meat and action movies. He goes to school with Lisa Himmler, the cute grand daughter of some german army commander.

name: The Strange Tale of Panorama Island
nutshell:
During the Meiji period, this story centers around an unsuccessful science fiction author who masquerades as the dead son of an industrial magnate. With his new family's riches, he creates a fantastical island to satisfy his desires.
In his manga adaptation of The Strange Tale of Panorama Island (Panorama-Tou Kidan), Maruo strays from his usual style of explicit gore while maintaining his trademark: elaborate, elegant art.
Sprawling, overwhelming landscapes, a diverse range of uniquely designed characters, and even scenes distorted grotesquely for effect are captured with ease by the talented and experienced mangaka.
Official English


Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Prize for New Artist in 2009

name: HERO - Akagi no Ishi o Tsugu Otoko
nutshell: A Ten spin-off series in which Igawa Hiroyuki, struck by the will of the genius mahjong player Akagi, quits his job and plunges into the world of mahjong. On a visit to Akagi's grave, Hiroyuki meets the legendary Ten, the boss of the East-West tournament, and challenges him to a mahjong match to settle the score...

name: Forbidden Love Over a Thousand Years
nutshell: The naïve low-level discipline of Zongtian residence, Zhan Yunchang, has been suffering from her unrequited love for Lang Guichi, her eminent senior brother for six full years before she finally acts on her impulse driven by alcohol and bared her heart to him.  However, she gradually discovers that Lang Guichi’s gentle demeanour is in fact harbouring aloofness which resulted from his unbearable past. Before long, Zhan Yunchang makes acquaintance with another senior brother, Cang Yan, who is free-spirited and uninhibited by nature. Nevertheless, he seems to be hiding his mysterious past as well.

name: Super Baby
nutshell:
A super sweet and heartwarming story about a gal from the countryside who moves to Tokyo with big dreams as a Yamamba and later turns into a fashionable Onee gyaru/Ane Agejo who falls in love while working at Machida 109.

Source Papillon Magazine

name: Vetsunova
nutshell: Oneshot about a virtual reality social networking service. Like the one in Accel World.

name: Fire Emblem: Kakusei - 4-koma Kings
nutshell:
4-koma anthology by various artists, based on the video game Fire Emblem Kakusei (Fire Emblem Awakening in the west).

Cover: Maiponpon
Illustrations: Shirataki Nako, Hanokage

name: Overbearing Loyal Dog Looking for Love
nutshell:
In a past life, he was her most loyal personal guardian. Then, he lost her forever. One day, he wakes up as a child in a strange place and sees a person who seems to be the reincarnation of his mistress. Thus begins his road to redemption!
French : Dans une vie passée, il était son gardien personnel le plus loyal.
Puis, il l'a perdue pour toujours.
Un jour, il se réveille dans le corps d'un enfant dans un endroit bizarre et voit une personne qui semble être la réincarnation de sa maîtresse.
Ainsi commence la voie de sa rédemption !

name: Mukidashi no Koi
nutshell: Nonokawa was reunited with his former best friend, Kouya, when he returned to his hometown after it sunk under the dam 12 years ago. It was also 12 years ago that he suddenly started lusting after his best friend… Will the feelings buried deep in his heart be exposed once again?

name: Yoiko-san to Furyou Sensei
nutshell:
Collection of short stories:

Yoiko-san to Furyou-sensei(良い子さんと不良先生) - Good Girl and Bad Teacher
Kanojo no Himitsu(彼女のひみつ) - Girl's Secret
Kitsune to Yuriko
Hinata to Kuroneko(ひなたと黒猫) - Hinata and the Black Cat
Maboroshi
Natsu
Kitsune no Densha
Mahoutsukai no Kanojo
Shisen
Nanohanasou

name: BACK TO THE Kaasan
nutshell:
Minayoshi Yuu is trying to help his mother Minayoshi Touko, who was once a national idol, recover from a strange "ailment." For her, he will do anything, even if it means finding a way to go back in time to erase the pain from her mother's past and bring her back to normal in the present.
Twitter

name: Busujima Kyouju no Tamago
nutshell: Rune believes that good children get spoiled except for her. She decides to run away from home. On the train she took, she encountered an odd stranger named Busujima… who keeps on insisting that she's an egg!

name: Final Fantasy XII - Creep Show (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
Balthier/Basch
Takes place between 'Beyond the Sky' and 'Your Voice Calling'. Balthier tries to figure out where he stands in his relationship with Basch.

name: Parallel In The Franxx
nutshell: Unofficial parody 4-koma manga of Darling in the FranXX.

name: Kare no Shousou to Koi ni Tsuite
nutshell: One day, Yajima, who kept on having physical relations only with older partners, met a young man, Watabe. Younger guys were never his type, but the hot sex he had with that man made that night unforgettable. What will happen to Yajima, who since then keeps on wanting to have flared up sex with Watabe again…?

name: Bread's Collection of One-shots
nutshell:
A collection of Bread's (mostly historical) one-shots from Pixiv!
Bread's Pixiv: https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/5464397

name: Sound of Bones
nutshell: A selection of short stories. The stories deal with the same themes as Parasyte and his other work, and in only one of them is his art style noticeably more primitive.

name: Hayasaka-san Won't Wait Around
nutshell: The couple is a study in contrast. The young lady is the talk of the town, while the young man is unsure of himself, and today, he's late to their first date! A warm and fuzzy high-school rom-com oneshot ensues.

name: Super Mario Kart Nintendo Official Guidebook
nutshell: A guidebook for Super Mario Kart that features artwork and manga by Benimaru Itoh.

name: Hunter Age
nutshell: A naive youngster, ignorant of the tragedy that happened 16 years ago, travels with the sworn enemy of his tribe; a Princess out on an excursion, due to the internal conflicts within the royal family, has to risk her life and survive in the mountains; A prodigy carrying the hopes of the entire tribe, at this very moment, doesn’t have much time left in this world… The 3 of them meet in a world fraught with dangers, will they be able to free themselves from their accursed fate?

name: Aekanaru
nutshell: Sadai, looking for a place to die, headed deep into the mountains. There he encountered a mysterious and gentle girl who had lived alone in an abandoned village for 150 years, continuing to serve an intangible god. A man that had failed to die and a widow with a graceful aura — from the remains of their wasted lives, the two of them begin a new chapter of their story.

name: Mahou Shoujo Lyrical Nanoha - Kimi to Kizu to Bansoukoui (Doujinshi)
Ima wa Mada "Osananajimi no Imouto" Desu kedo.
nutshell: Touka Futahara is the younger sister of Iori Fuyutsuki's childhood friend and an incoming student at their high school. She's a self-proclaimed little devil and "the girl most envied by seniors." Now she's waiting at Iori's door every morning. "Senpai! Give me your hand! Let's hold hands to stay warm!" But Iori knows that Touka's actually more like a shy puppy who blushes at the slightest touch. All the bold teasing is just an act, and she's feeling nervous inside.

name: Familyman
nutshell: While Gang-ho was working at the local factory, he slept only three hours a day and worked like a horse. However, after his face was burned with the fire, he was dismissed from his workplace. He now does not want his daughter to be scared of his face, so he decided to wear the costume of SUPERHERO, “Guru-man”, and stay with her.
